page.title: 05Bramhope: Recreation
page.content: There are lots of amusements for all ages in Bramhope.For adults,there are: {The Fox and Hounds Pub,the tennis {courts at the Craven Institute,Rugby {Club at West Park,Golden Acre Park}and other activities organised by the Church.There are lots of children's clubs organised by the Craven Institute,such as,{ballet}and{tap {dancing lessons.}There are thriving {Cubs,Scouts,Brownies}and{Guides,}but children spend a lot of time playing out with friends.Both children and adults take active part in sport, particularly{swimming.}Bramhope is surrounded by several large towns where people often go to the{theatre, {concerts}and various sporting activities.We feel that whatever your interests are you would find that living in the village of Bramhope,you will always find plenty to do.
